text: Paahi etu yakhalha malhove o ntheko unommwiiha nookhwa aalhepiye vachulhu vibau cho malhuku o uhemiya, ni uwa wo nthimicho wo waaria chinene, mpaka ata attu o Israeli nkayoocheelha uweha ikhove ya ashinna Musa, wo nlhatu wo waaria waya. Ukhalhawaya ikhove aya yaaria nthimicho wa Nlhuku, inakhalhaka wahowalhawalha wo uhipicha. Yakhalhaka etu malhehero anommwiiha nookhwa yaawiilhe wo nthimicho mwinchi thoko chiicho,
